growsseth.notif.researcher_updated: The researcher has something new for you.
growsseth.notif.setLanguage.title: Ruins of Growsseth Language Autodetect
growsseth.notif.setLanguage.message: Set mod structure texts to language %s
growsseth.config.title: Ruins of Growsseth
growsseth.config.needsWorldReload.commen: If changed ingame, takes effect on world reload.
growsseth.config.serverLanguage.name: Server language
growsseth.config.serverLanguage.comment: Choose between 'en_us' and 'it_it'. Used for npc dialogues, researcher diaries and structure books. Will not affect already generated structures. Additional languages can be added by datapack.
growsseth.config.modLootInVanillaStructu: Generate mod loot in vanilla structures
growsseth.config.enableLocationTitles.co: Shows the title of the places you are visiting when exploring the Growsseth world preset.
growsseth.config.locationTitlesMode.name: Location titles display mode
growsseth.config.newTradeNotifications.c: Shows a small toast when the researcher unlocks new trades. Works only for web and progress trades.
growsseth.config.singleResearcher.name: Single researcher
growsseth.config.singleResearcher.commen: Shares memory between all researcher entities (narratively assume it's the 'same' Researcher moving around). Applies on first spawn or with the command '/greset'. Will affect dialogues and trades (multiple researchers will always have a random selection of trades that do not change). In Growsseth world preset this will always be true.
growsseth.config.immortalResearcher.name: Immortal researcher
growsseth.config.immortalResearcher.comm: Applies Resistance V and Regeneration V to the researcher, and prevents him from fighting the player.
growsseth.config.researcherWritesDiaries: When the player visits a structure of the mod the researcher will generate a diary related to it in the tent's lectern. If another diary is on the lectern it will be moved to the tent chest, and even if that is full it will drop on the ground. Does not work if single researcher is off.
growsseth.config.researcherBorrowPenalty: Trade price multiplier for borrowing the researcher's donkey. Only affects emeralds.
growsseth.config.researcherTeleports.com: The researcher teleports back to his original position after five minutes away from it, and avoids interacting with Nether and End portals to prevent cheese.
growsseth.config.researcherAntiCheat.com: If the player tries to cheat while fighting the researcher he will drink a turtle master potion and enable a passive regen to prevent him from dying.
growsseth.config.researcherInteractsWith: Zombies, skeletons, raiders and vexes will be hostile towards the researcher, and he will react to them and other mobs who attack him. If changed ingame, takes effect on world reload.
The researcher will attack the mobs mentioned in the previous setting (if enabled) even when they are not attacking him. If changed ingame, takes effect on world reload.
growsseth.config.singleResearcherProgres: Trades and quest progress for single researcher

Ignored if single researcher is false. If enabled, the researcher will initially only sell one kind of map, and unlock more structures as you return to him after finding the previous one. In this mode, the researcher's 'quest' will automatically progress (see quest config section). If disabled, each instance of the researcher will have up to N random maps (see randomTradeMaxMaps) for sale, with no quest progress. Always true with a fixed order in Growsseth world preset.
growsseth.config.webTrades.name: Web trades
growsseth.config.webTrades.comment: Whether to apply gamemaster-controlled trades when web data sync is enabled.
growsseth.config.tradesRestockTime.name: Trades restock time
growsseth.config.tradesRestockTime.comme: If >0, the time (in fraction of ingame days) it takes for the researcher to refresh his trade uses.
growsseth.config.randomTradeNumMaps.name: Amount of random trade maps
growsseth.config.randomTradeNumMaps.comm: Max map amount the researcher sells. Used only when single researcher (or trade progress for single researcher) is disabled.
growsseth.config.randomTradeNumItems.com: Max misc item amount the researcher sells. Used for random trades included in all trade modes except web (limited by progress for progress modes).
growsseth.config.randomTradesRefreshTime: If >0, the time (in fraction of ingame days) it takes for the researcher to change his random trades when single researcher (or trade progress for single researcher) is disabled.
growsseth.config.webDataSync.name: Enable HTTP syncing
growsseth.config.webDataSync.comment: CAREFUL: check the Wiki on GitHub for how to use this. Enables gamemaster-mode, allowing the player you decide to connect to to control the mod's features and more. Requires reloading world.
growsseth.config.dataSyncUrl.name: URL for the sync API
growsseth.config.dataSyncEndpoint.name: Endpoint for the sync API (requires restarting the game)
growsseth.config.dataSyncApiKey.name: API Key for the server (optional)
growsseth.config.dataSyncReloadTime.name: Sync reload interval
growsseth.config.dataSyncReloadTime.comm: How much time (in minutes) must pass between each server query. Must be at least 10 seconds.
growsseth.config.liveUpdateService.name: (WIP) Enable the live update service
growsseth.config.liveUpdateUrl.name: (WIP) URL for reloading API data from remote
growsseth.config.liveUpdatePort.name: (WIP) Port for reloading API data from remote (optional)
Allow the gamemaster to execute any arbitrary command.
growsseth.config.finalQuestStartName.nam: Event name for the start of the final quest
growsseth.config.finalQuestZombieName.na: Event name for the zombiefication of the researcher
growsseth.config.finalQuestLeaveName.nam: Event name for making the researcher leave
growsseth.config.researcherCuredDiscount: Price multiplier for the researcher's trades after curing him. Only affects emeralds.
growsseth.config.researcherTentEnabled.n: Enable spawn of the researcher's tent
growsseth.config.caveCampEnabled.name: Enable spawn of the camp in the cave
growsseth.config.beekeeperHouseEnabled.n: Enable spawn of the beekeeper's house
growsseth.config.conduitChurchEnabled.na: Enable spawn of the conduit church
growsseth.config.enchantTowerEnabled.nam: Enable spawn of the shattered tower
growsseth.config.abandonedForgeEnabled.n: Enable spawn of the abandoned forge
growsseth.config.noteblockLabEnabled.nam: Enable spawn of the musician's house
growsseth.config.golemHouseEnabled.name: Enable spawn of the house of the golem maker
growsseth.config.conduitRuinsEnabled.nam: Enable spawn of the conduit ruins (extra)
growsseth.config.noteblockShipEnabled.na: Enable spawn of the musician's ship (extra)
growsseth.config.researcherTentSimpleEna: Enable spawn of the researcher's tent with no cellar (variant)
Warning: with this version the final quest might work incorrectly. It's also recommended to enable only one variant.
growsseth.config.structuresDebugMode.com: Make structures wildly more likely, for dev usage.
growsseth.config.researcherTent.name: Researcher tent
growsseth.config.caveCamp.name: Cave camp
growsseth.config.caveCampMarker.name: Cave camp marker

growsseth.config.conduitChurch.name: Conduit church
growsseth.config.enchantTower.name: Enchant tower
